bookeater.bound.message: You can't do that, you're bound to the current dimension
effect.bookeater.adrenaline_rush.descrip: The user will get faster the lower their health gets.
effect.bookeater.aqua_affinity.descripti: Allows the user to use tools underwater.
effect.bookeater.backstabbing.descriptio: The user will do more damage if done from behind.
effect.bookeater.bane_of_arthropods.desc: The user will be invisible to arthropods.
effect.bookeater.bouncy.description: The user gets infused with a bouncy ball.
effect.bookeater.bound.description: The user gets bound to it's current dimension.
effect.bookeater.depth_strider.descripti: The user gains additional speed the lower they get in the world.
effect.bookeater.drizzle.description: The user gains additional speed while wet.
effect.bookeater.exquisite_touch.descrip: The user will get more value out of food.
effect.bookeater.herding_harmony.descrip: The user will get followed by farm animals.
effect.bookeater.life_mending.descriptio: Regenerates health when picking up experience.
effect.bookeater.looter.description: The user has a chance of disarming enemies when sneaking and looking at them.
effect.bookeater.projectile_repellent.de: Has a chance to repel incoming projectiles.
effect.bookeater.shifting.description: The user is forced to sneak hastily.
effect.bookeater.smite.description: The user does more damage to undead mobs.
effect.bookeater.sturdy_defenses.descrip: The user's armor will take less damage.
effect.bookeater.thorns.description: Plants temporary thorns around the user.
effect.bookeater.water_walking.descripti: The user gains the ability to walk on water.
effect.bookeater.weed_wacker.description: Allows the user to hit mobs through weeds.
